#labels Featured
= Changelog =

  * Parsing of (multi-file) torrents, metalink templates, hash and mirror list files (or URLs).
  * Automatic searching and hashing of local download files (MD5, SHA1, SHA256, ED2K).
  * Automatic generation of P2P download links for known hashes (ED2K and Magnet).
  * Convenient change_filename() to update existing Metalink files for new releases.
  * For more compact library usage, array and iterator access for metalink objects is supported.
  * Basic command-line interface for cronjobs and daemon scripts (directory watcher, ...).
